name: Sweet New Year Cocktail
description: In the Jewish faith, Rosh Hashanah marks the new year, and is often celebrated with apples and honey to symbolize the sweet year that is to come.
recipeIngredient: Handful of mint plus more to garnish
1/2 ounce honey liqueur such as Barenjager (see notes)

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, muddle mint and sugar lightly.
Add applejack and honey liqueur, fill with ice. Shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass, garnish with mint, and serve.
